triples.name: Schema (psychology)
triples.relevance: The paper discusses schema theory as a foundational framework for understanding how people process and structure information.

triples.name: Frederic Bartlett
triples.relevance: Bartlett's 1932 work on schemas and memory is the primary historical foundation cited in the paper.

triples.name: Memory
triples.relevance: The paper examines how schemas function in memory organization and recall of information.

triples.name: Recall (memory)
triples.relevance: Recall is a central process investigated in the paper, showing how schema structure facilitates memory retrieval.

triples.name: Perception
triples.relevance: The paper discusses how schemas are matched against stimulus configurations in perceptual experience.
